name: mlprimitives.candidates.dsp.Moments
author: Rodrigo Diez <rjdiez@mit.edu>
description: Anomalies detection in satellite telemetry data using a spectral mask

output.name: anomalies
output.descrtiption: Data vector consisting of the anomalies detected in the telemetry data

gain.description: Multiplication factor used in the comparisson between the moments calculated using the training data and the moments of the telemetry data vector

offset.description: Offset used in the comparisson between the moments calculated using the training data and the moments of the telemetry data vector

window_length.description: Length of the sliding window in number of samples

step.description: Step defining the position for two consecutive sliding windows in number of samples
